com.github.codeteapot.tools.packer

Interface PackerTerminal


  • public interface PackerTerminal
    Interface for satisfying communication between Packer commands execution and application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<File> getWorkingDir()
      Working directory on where command will be executed, or empty for default.
      void receive(PackerMessage message)
      Method called when a message is sent by Packer command execution, having this message as parameter.
      void send(PackerInput input)
      Method called when Packer command execution wants an user interaction.

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkingDir

        Optional<File> getWorkingDir()
        Working directory on where command will be executed, or empty for default.
        Returns:
        Working directory, or empty for default.

      • receive

        void receive(PackerMessage message)
      throws PackerAbortionException
        Method called when a message is sent by Packer command execution, having this message as parameter.

        This method can abort the underlying command execution by throwing PackerAbortionException.

        Parameters:
        message - Message sent by command execution.
        Throws:
        PackerAbortionException - If underlying execution must be aborted.

      • send

        void send(PackerInput input)
   throws PackerAbortionException
        Method called when Packer command execution wants an user interaction.

        Text written to PackerInput is committed after this method is called.

        This method can abort the underlying command execution by throwing PackerAbortionException.

        Parameters:
        input - Input where user interaction text is written.
        Throws:
        PackerAbortionException - If underlying execution must be aborted.
